sections.title: What Are Cookies
content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.
Cookies help us understand how you use our website, remember your preferences, and improve your overall experience.

sections.title: How We Use Cookies
content: Coreway Solution uses cookies and similar tracking technologies for the following purposes:

highlightList.title: Essential Website Functionality:
highlightList.text: Enable core features like security, network management, and accessibility

highlightList.title: Performance and Analytics:
highlightList.text: Understand how visitors interact with our website to improve user experience

highlightList.title: Personalization:
highlightList.text: Remember your preferences and settings for a customized experience

highlightList.title: Marketing and Advertising:
highlightList.text: Deliver relevant advertisements and measure campaign effectiveness

cookieTypes.name: Strictly Necessary Cookies
cookieTypes.description: These cookies are required for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They are usually set in response to actions you take, such as setting privacy preferences, logging in, or filling in forms.

cookieTypes.name: Performance Cookies
cookieTypes.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. They help us improve website performance and user experience.

cookieTypes.name: Functional Cookies
cookieTypes.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences, language selection, or region.

cookieTypes.name: Targeting/Advertising Cookies
cookieTypes.description: These cookies track your browsing activity to deliver advertisements that are relevant to you and your interests. They also help measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

sections.title: Third-Party Cookies
content: We use various third-party services that may set cookies on your device. These services include:
additionalContent: We do not have control over third-party cookies. Please review the privacy policies of these services for more information about how they use cookies.

sections.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences
content: You have several options to manage or disable cookies:

methods.title: Browser Settings
methods.description: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or delete certain cookies. Note that disabling cookies may affect the functionality of our website.

methods.title: Cookie Consent Manager
methods.description: When you first visit our website, you can accept or reject non-essential cookies through our cookie consent banner. You can change your preferences at any time by accessing the cookie settings.

methods.title: Opt-Out Tools
methods.description: You can opt out of interest-based advertising through industry opt-out tools:

sections.title: Cookie Retention
content: Different cookies have different retention periods:

highlightList.title: Session Cookies:
highlightList.text: Deleted automatically when you close your browser

highlightList.title: Persistent Cookies:
highlightList.text: Remain on your device for a set period or until manually deleted

highlightList.title: Third-Party Cookies:
highlightList.text: Retention periods are determined by the third-party service provider

sections.title: Updates to This Cookie Policy
content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, legislation, or our business operations. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated policy on our website with a revised "Last Updated" date.
We encourage you to review this Cookie Policy periodically to stay informed about how we use cookies.
